quizDescription.text:
1. This code is a very simple implementation of a web server. It handles one GET request /hello. You can download the code and run it. It will run until you hit a Ctrl + c. While the program is running you can open the browser and enter the URL localhost:8080/hello to see the response web page.
Link

What happens when the url is http://localhost:8080/HELLO? How should we change the web server code to enable case insensitive URLs?

2. The code is extended to handle 2 GET requests. One is the /hello and the second is /hola (hello in spanish).
Link

To send a “File Not Found Error” self. send_error() function is used. How is this function provided? What exactly does the send_error do?
